title: BackupManifest
description: A schema for the backup-manifest.json file for profile backups created by the BackupService

date.description: Date and time that the backup was created

appName.description: Name of the application that the backup was created for.

appVersion.description: Full version string for the app instance that the backup was created on

buildID.description: Build ID for the app instance that the backup was created on

profileName.description: The name given to the profile that was backed up

machineName.description: The name of the machine that the backup was created on

osName.description: The OS name that the backup was created on

osVersion.description: The OS version that the backup was created on

accountID.description: The ID for the account that the user profile was signed into when backing up. Optional.

accountEmail.description: The email address for the account that the user profile was signed into when backing up. Optional.

legacyClientID.description: The legacy telemetry client ID for the profile that the backup was created on.

profileGroupID.description: The ID for the profile group that the backup was created on. Optional.

version.description: Version of the backup manifest structure
